CustomField.description: Chooses the following Friday at 9:00AM EST. Used for MPSC Chatter Update Process Builder flow. Created for Case 20266115. Not used anymore - case 22091258.
CustomField.formula: CASE( MOD( Proposed_Run_Date__c - DATE(1900, 1, 7), 7), 0, DATETIMEVALUE((Proposed_Run_Date__c + 5)) + ((14 * 60)/1440), 1, DATETIMEVALUE((Proposed_Run_Date__c + 4))+((14 * 60)/1440), 2, DATETIMEVALUE((Proposed_Run_Date__c + 3))+((14 * 60)/1440), 3, DATETIMEVALUE((Proposed_Run_Date__c + 2))+((14 * 60)/1440), 4, DATETIMEVALUE((Proposed_Run_Date__c + 1))+((14 * 60)/1440), 5, DATETIMEVALUE((Proposed_Run_Date__c + 7))+((14 * 60)/1440), 6, DATETIMEVALUE((Proposed_Run_Date__c + 6))+((14 * 60)/1440),null)
CustomField.label: Payroll Run Date Due
